name: Intelligent Apps GmbH
goal:
mytaxi was founded in June 2009 and was the world’s first taxi app that established a direct connection between a passenger and a taxi driver. With more than 10 million passengers and 100,000 drivers, mytaxi is the leading taxi e-hailing app in Europe.
Since September 2014, mytaxi has been part of Daimler Mobility Services GmbH (part of the Daimler Group). In July 2016, mytaxi announced a merger with Hailo, the leading taxi app in the UK and Ireland, an important step in becoming the leading taxi e-hailing app in Europe. mytaxi today works with 500 employees in 26 offices and is available in around 100 European cities. Eckart Diepenhorst is the CEO of mytaxi.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: Transport & Mobility, Digital Single Market, Online Platforms, Consumer Protection, Sustainable Transport, Smart Cities.
